<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/customnavigation/get/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a custom navigation item by the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
